MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 and LL22 postcode areas of Denbigh and Abergele. Affecting properties in LLannefydd, Llanfairtalhaiarn and surrounding areas. Our engineers have arrived on site to assess the fault and have advised repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the damage to our overhead line equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.40AM on 11th November 2020
